item.title: All Night Long
item.description: [[songs/j/jpegmafia/all_my_heroes_are_cornballs/jesus_forgive_me_i_am_a_thot.md#pray-pray-pray-vyl-wnanory|When the night is closing]] [[songs/j/jpegmafia/all_my_heroes_are_cornballs/jesus_forgive_me_i_am_a_thot.md#pray-pray-pray-vyl-wnanory|Eyes are running wild]] [[songs/j/jpegmafia/all_my_heroes_are_cornballs/jesus_forgive_me_i_am_a_thot.md#pray-pray-pray-vyl-wnanory|Then I hear you humming]] [[songs/j/jpegmafia/all_my_heroes_are_cornballs/jesus_forgive_me_i_am_a_thot.md#pray-pray-pray-vyl-wnanory|All night long]] [[songs/m/manufacture/terrorvision/as_the_end_draws_near.md#you-and-me-we-stand-alone-vyl-wnanory|The sign I see it]] [[songs/m/manufacture/terrorvision/as_the_end_draws_near.

item.title: Cuts You Up
item.description: [[songs/t/twenty_one_pilots/blurryface/goner.md#im-a-goner-somebody-catch-my-breath-vyl-wnanory|I find you in the morning]] [[songs/t/twenty_one_pilots/blurryface/goner.md#im-a-goner-somebody-catch-my-breath-vyl-wnanory|After dreams of distant signs]] [[songs/t/twenty_one_pilots/blurryface/goner.md#im-a-goner-somebody-catch-my-breath-vyl-wnanory|You pour yourself over me]] [[songs/t/twenty_one_pilots/blurryface/goner.md#im-a-goner-somebody-catch-my-breath-vyl-wnanory|Like the sun through the blinds]] [[songs/c/circa_survive/blue_sky_noise/get_out.
